components.description: A human leg, shown detached from a human body. Displayed from the thigh and may include the foot.
components.title: Leg

description: A human leg, shown detached from a human body. Displayed from the thigh and may include the foot.
title: Leg

version.description:
Unicode 11.0 was released on June 5, 2018. Emojis that require new code points for release are listed on this page but for the full 2018 emoji list see Emoji 11.0.

Emoji 11.0 includes every new emoji, including variations for skin tone, gender and new emojis that don't require additional code points, such as the chess pawn or pirate flag which are not shown on this page.

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the leg emoji presents a smooth, rounded limb with subtle shading that hints at realistic form and texture. Its design, characteristic of Appleâ€™s playful yet polished aesthetic, features soft highlights and a gentle gradient, making it appear both approachable and anatomically recognizable. This emoji is frequently used to convey movement, physical activity, or simply to represent a body part in a lighthearted or casual digital conversation.
